meta_description: Hangzhou Karn New Building Materials Co., Ltd. is a professional manufacturer of wallpaper adhesive powder, offering high-quality products and OEM services.

hero.title: Professional Wallpaper Adhesive Manufacturer
hero.subtitle: Providing high-quality, eco-friendly, and easy-to-use wallpaper adhesive products with customized OEM manufacturing services for global clients

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Discover our premium wallpaper adhesive powder series, providing perfect solutions for your decoration needs

why_us.title: Why Choose Us
why_us.subtitle: We are committed to providing the highest quality wallpaper adhesive products and exceptional customer service

quality.title: Product Quality
quality.description: Our products are made from premium raw materials and undergo rigorous quality testing to ensure each batch meets international standards

experience.title: Industry Experience
experience.description: With over 15 years of experience in wallpaper adhesive production, we deeply understand market needs and continuously innovate our products

service.title: Customer Service
service.description: We provide comprehensive customer support, including product consultation, technical guidance, and after-sales service to ensure customer satisfaction

cta.title: Start Collaboration
cta.description: Whether you're looking for wholesale purchasing or OEM custom production, we can provide the best solution for you. Contact us to start your customization journey.
